title: Trump 401(k)? The president could announce retirement plans for people whose employers don’t offer them.
summary: President Donald Trump could use his State of the Union address on Tuesday night to unveil the plan.
content: President Donald Trump could use his State of the Union address on Tuesday night to unveil the plan.

title: More than 80% say affordability has not improved under Trump, exclusive YouGov-MarketWatch poll finds
summary: Trump will have the opportunity to tout his record on cost-of-living issues during Tuesday’s State of the Union address.
content: Trump will have the opportunity to tout his record on cost-of-living issues during Tuesday’s State of the Union address.

title: Epstein files: DOJ may have withheld FBI interviews with Trump accuser, Rep. Garcia says
summary: President Donald Trump last week said the files on Jeffrey Epstein released by the Department of Justice had "totally exonerated" him.
content: President Donald Trump last week said the files on Jeffrey Epstein released by the Department of Justice had "totally exonerated" him.

summary: BBC News NI having been looking at they key aspects of the new guidelines.

title: Home Depot tops earnings estimates for the first time in a year as demand for projects remains muted
summary: Home Depot beat fiscal fourth-quarter earnings expectations after missing estimates the prior three quarters.
content: Home Depot beat fiscal fourth-quarter earnings expectations after missing estimates the prior three quarters.

title: Spirit Airlines plans to slash flights, fleet in bid to emerge from bankruptcy as early as spring
summary: Spirit Airlines said it has reached an agreement with lenders to emerge from bankruptcy by late spring or early summer.
content: Spirit Airlines said it has reached an agreement with lenders to emerge from bankruptcy by late spring or early summer.

title: Trump to deliver State of the Union address as voters sour on his economy
summary: Dem Gov. Abigail Spanberger of Virginia will deliver the official rebuttal for Democrats after romping to victory in 2025 on an affordability-focused agenda.
content: Dem Gov. Abigail Spanberger of Virginia will deliver the official rebuttal for Democrats after romping to victory in 2025 on an affordability-focused agenda.

title: ‘I found out too late’: My stepmother cheated me out of $500K from my father’s estate. What can I do?
summary: “Within a week or two after the deadline to contest the will expired, my stepmother sent me an email stating she would not share anything.”
content: “Within a week or two after the deadline to contest the will expired, my stepmother sent me an email stating she would not share anything.”

title: AI will lead to mass unemployment, a new paper says — but other researchers are skeptical
summary: The Citrini Research paper imagines a scenario in which widespread AI adoption leads to disruption and societal chaos. Evercore called it “thought-provoking” but “implausible.”
content: The Citrini Research paper imagines a scenario in which widespread AI adoption leads to disruption and societal chaos. Evercore called it “thought-provoking” but “implausible.”

title: Fed's Goolsbee calls for a hold on cuts as current rate of inflation is 'not good enough'
summary: The Chicago Fed president said Tuesday that cuts aren't appropriate until there's more evidence that inflation is on its way down.
content: The Chicago Fed president said Tuesday that cuts aren't appropriate until there's more evidence that inflation is on its way down.

title: AMD’s stock rockets as Meta deal serves as major validation point for investors
summary: Meta, looking to diversify beyond Nvidia, bets big on AMD chips, with a chance to invest in the company.
content: Meta, looking to diversify beyond Nvidia, bets big on AMD chips, with a chance to invest in the company.

title: Consumers are more upbeat about the U.S. economy than previously thought
summary: Consumer spending has been the most important driver of economic growth over the past year.
content: Consumer spending has been the most important driver of economic growth over the past year.

title: My grandpa retired happily at 70 with $750K after working as a missionary. I know where most Americans go wrong.
summary: “You could even retire at 55 with $500,000 and be perfectly fine. Am I right?”
content: “You could even retire at 55 with $500,000 and be perfectly fine. Am I right?”

title: Novo Nordisk to slash GLP-1 list prices by up to 50% in U.S. to cut costs for insured patients
summary: The cuts aim to make the drugs more accessible to insured patients, particularly people with high-deductible health plans or co-insurance benefit designs.
content: The cuts aim to make the drugs more accessible to insured patients, particularly people with high-deductible health plans or co-insurance benefit designs.

title: Federal Reserve Signals Potential Rate Cut in March
summary: The Federal Reserve has indicated it may cut interest rates at its March meeting, citing cooling inflation data. Markets rallied on the news, with the S&P 500 reaching new highs.

title: TSMC Plans $40 Billion Investment in US Chip Manufacturing
summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company announces a massive expansion of its US operations, with new facilities planned in Arizona and Ohio. The investment is expected to create 10,000 jobs.

title: Oil Prices Drop Below $60 as OPEC+ Increases Output
summary: Crude oil prices fell sharply after OPEC+ agreed to gradually increase production starting in April. Analysts expect continued downward pressure on energy costs through mid-2026.
